descriptionHTML:
Spotlight watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Spotlight Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Spotlight Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Battery level
✔ Day of the week

How to use Spotlight Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Spotlight watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Spotlight Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: Pretty, but does not have an option for displaying the day of the week AND the date together, which is my preference. Also, does not include an ambient mode, which is a deal breaker for me, so I will not be using this one.
